data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample CASSI-22

Exposition SE, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Moräne mit groben Blöcken, Tree line 1080 m, av. Tree height 28 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 25%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: Alt. Best. auf Moräne. Gut drain. Lok. Flecht, Film number: 743A
